thread.title: Best of the Falcons and Patriots
thread.title_full: Best of the Falcons and Patriots

title: Best of the Falcons and Patriots
text:
Super Bowl LI: Atlanta Falcons and New England Patriots' best plays Last Updated: 04/02/17 7:29am We look back at the best moments from the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons journey through the play-offs. What was your best play? This weekend marks the NFL's showpiece event: Super Bowl LI. 
The New England Patriots will play for their fifth Vince Lombardi trophy, taking on the Atlanta Falcons, who have only ever made the big game twice. New England Patriots v Atlanta Falcons NFL Super Bowl LI February 5, 2017, 10:00pm Get Sky Sports Get a Sky Sports pass 
Since Atlanta's last Super Bowl in 1998, where they lost to the Denver Broncos 34-19, the Patriots have been involved in six match-ups, and quarterback Tom Brady has led the team to four victories. 
This year, the Falcons have been a free-scoring team to be reckoned with, but will face their toughest challenge on Sunday, where they come up against a Patriots side who have the meanest defence in the league. 
With a raft of talent on both sides, Sky Sports put together their favourite play-off moments from both teams. 
From Logan Ryan's huge interception against the Houston Texans, to Julio Jones' catch-and-run touchdown against the Green Bay Packers. Neil Reynolds and Jeff Reinebold make their fantasy team from Super Bowl LI players. 
To watch all of our favourite plays, click on the video above. Any moments we've missed? Let us know on twitter, @SkySportsNFL . 
Sky Sports is home of the Super Bowl. Watch all the build up, action, and reaction live on Sky Sports 1 and Sky Sports Mix, from 10pm on Sunday. Also See:
